body.raw:
Year end stats: 

- Net worth change from peak: -49.6%
- Net worth change from initial investment: -13.29%
- Net worth change from peak to trough: -72.81%

Ytd performance summary:
Discovered betting, did very well (~5x from initial deposit)

Went way too hard on two bets that eroded 60% of my portfolio (including gains)

Bet way too hard on subsequent bets

Took a break, made some back

Now sitting at ~-10% from the start.


---
# Understanding gambling dynamics

If you lose 50% of your portfolio, you also lose the opportunity cost of the lost money, i.e. risk free rate or other expectation of the lost money, and the time used to invest the money.

in 2025, I'm going to minimize risk, protect my capital, and aim for knowledge first.

My goal is $100k. That's skywalker tier money.

I'll also buy a car if I hit that goal,, something cheap like ~10-15k.
